page.title: 02Village Activities.
page.content: There are many different activities in our village.There are clubs for old and young,men and women.The Women's Institute has been going for sixty years and has got thirty members.It meets once per month.The Senior Residents meet every fortnight on a Tuesday.There are thirty two members and they are picked up by a coach. Mrs.Prudden, our secretary at school, is president of the W.I. and Mrs. Hardman one of our teachers helps with the S.R. club.Every Wednesday we go to Brownies.We play games with our packs and sometimes we go swimming.There is also Guides for the older girls.There is a village cricket club.The youth club meets on Thursday night and Playgroup takes place in the village hall.There are dramatic,gardening,art and lots of other village and societies.
